title: Antioxidant, Polyphenol, Physical, and Sensory Changes in Myofibrillar Protein Gels Supplemented with Polyphenol-Rich Plant-Based Additives.
abstract: Plant-based additives such as blackcurrant juice and pomace, as well as herbal extracts fromMelissa officinalisandCentella asiatica, possess well-established health-promoting properties. This study aimed to investigate how the incorporation of polyphenol-rich plant-based additives into a myofibrillar protein matrix could enhance the nutritional value, antioxidant potential, and sensory quality of novel food gels.
